Module com.example.sae_sisfrance
Package fr.groupeF.sae_sisfrance

Class MyBindings

java.lang.Object
fr.groupeF.sae_sisfrance.MyBindings
public class MyBindings extends Object
A class that provides methods for creating bidirectional bindings between Nodes and data filters.

  • Field Details

    • converterDoubleToString

      public static javafx.util.StringConverter<Number> converterDoubleToString
      A StringConverter fonction that converts a Number object to a formatted string representation. It is used for bindind a String and a Double Property with a condition.

    • converterIntToString

      public static javafx.util.StringConverter<Number> converterIntToString
      A StringConverter fonction that converts a Number object to a formatted string representation. It is used for bindind a String and a Interger Property with a condition.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyBindings

      public MyBindings()

  • Method Details

    • createBindingDates

      public static void createBindingDates(DataFilter dataEarthquakes, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker startDateFilter, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker endDateFilter)
      Creates a bidirectional binding between the start/end date filter and the selected start/end date in the data filter. Changes in the start date filter will update the selected start date in the data filter, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      dataEarthquakes - The data filter containing the selected start date.
      startDateFilter - The UI control for the start date filter.

    • createBindingZone

      public static void createBindingZone(DataFilter dataFilter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> zoneFilter)
      Creates a bidirectional binding between the zone filter and the selected zone in the data filter. Changes in the zone filter will update the selected zone in the data filter, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      dataFilter - The data filter containing the selected zone.
      zoneFilter - The UI control for the zone filter.

    • createBindingCoordinate

      public static void createBindingCoordinate(DataFilter dataFilter, javafx.scene.control.TextField longFilter, javafx.scene.control.TextField latFilter, javafx.scene.control.TextField rayonFilter)
      Creates bidirectional bindings between the coordinate filters and the selected coordinates in the data filter. Changes in the coordinate filters will update the selected coordinates in the data filter, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      dataFilter - The data filter containing the selected coordinates.
      longFilter - The UI control for the longitude filter.
      latFilter - The UI control for the latitude filter.
      rayonFilter - The UI control for the rayon filter.

    • createBindingIntensity

      public static void createBindingIntensity(DataFilter dataFilter, org.controlsfx.control.RangeSlider intensityFilter)
      Creates bidirectional bindings between the intensity filter and the selected intensity range in the data filter. Changes in the intensity filter will update the selected intensity range in the data filter, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      dataFilter - The data filter containing the selected intensity range.
      intensityFilter - The UI control for the intensity filter.

    • createBindingQuality

      public static void createBindingQuality(DataFilter dataFilter, List<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox> qualityFilter, List<String> labels)
      Creates bidirectional bindings between the quality filters and the selected quality options in the data filter. Changes in the quality filters will update the selected quality options in the data filter, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      dataFilter - The data filter containing the selected quality options.
      qualityFilter - The CheckBox for the quality filters.
      labels - The labels associated with the quality filters.
